snippet: Ashley Parker discusses the latest hints on the Romney campaign's search for a running mate; Rick Berke and Jim Rutenberg explain the difficulties in trying to break the story; Kate Zernike breaks down how Chris Christie found himself out of the...
abstract: Ashley Parker discusses the latest hints on the Romney campaign's search for a running mate; Rick Berke and Jim Rutenberg explain the difficulties in trying to break the story; Kate Zernike breaks down how Chris Christie found himself out of the running; Jeremy W. Peters explains the latest in campaign ad sniping; and McKay Coppins from BuzzFeed reports from a gathering of Mormons in upstate New York.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Mormons (Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints)
